column1: What are some good places to eat around campus?
column2: Check out the establishments at York Lanes including z-teca.

column1: What courses do I need to take in my first year?
column2: Find your Academic Calendar here: https://calendars.students.yorku.ca/

column1: What prerequisites do I need to take for this class?
column2: CourseDelta is a great resource: https://coursedelta.yorku.dev/

column1: Help! I don’t know where my class is!
column2: Check out your schedule for your Building Acronym and Room Number. The first digit of the room number indicates the floor.

column1: How do I make friends?
column2: Making friends in university can be scary but it doesn’t have to be! Join clubs and events (like Hackathons!)

column1: Help! I need a walk home and it is late at night!
Is there a gym on campus?
column2: Yes- York University has a gym called Tait McKenzie.

column1: Can you help me and give feedback on my schedule?
column2: Unfortunately I am not that advanced- try asking Reddit (at your own risk)

column1: Hi
column2: Hi! I’m yuChatBot. What can I do for you today?

column1: What are some cheap places to eat around campus?
column2: The orange snail and Burger king at the Quad and the Tim hortons at William Small centre have affordable meals. Osmows at the quad and Pita land at york lanes also have great student deals.

column1: How do I see if space is available in a course?
column2: Open the YorkU visual schedule builder and enter the course code of your desired course. If the course is full there will be an exclamation point next to it indicating that it is full. You can also view availability from the YorkU courses website which will tell you whether a course is full limited cancelled or reserved.

column1: I lost something where is lost and found?
column2: South Ross Building Room 107 (Vari Hall/Ross Link) for Keele campus

column1: I am struggling with my course. Check if your course offers Pass program
I am struggling with my life. Where can I talk about this?
What are some clubs that a computer science student can join?
column2: Some computer science clubs at Yorku include The Computing Students Hub (CSHub).

column1: I need help.
column2: Don't fear! There is plenty of support offered by the academic advisors at York University. Each faculty has an office for advising services. Visit https://students.yorku.ca/advising/academic to find more resources and support.

column1: What are the addresses of all the campuses?
column2: York University has 3 campuses in the Toronto area. Our main campus is the Keele campus: located at 4700 Keele St
